structure.unit: ARTICLE II. BIDDING ON PUBLIC PROJECTS

text.section:
Sec. 10-36. Utility connection fees not biddable.
Utility connection fees, as hereinafter defined, shall not be included in the bid of any prime contractor. Upon the prime contractor's receipt from the utility of an invoice setting forth the utility connection fee, the prime contractor shall forward said invoice to the County, and the County shall pay the utility connection fee directly to the utility. For the purposes of this section, "utility connection fee" includes connection charges, impact fees and other cost factors which represent a proportionate share of the cost of other water and sewer facilities.
